endpoints.description: Fetch current and historical energy pricing data for all supported energy types.
Retrieve data on current supply levels for various energy resources.
Analyze effects of geopolitical changes on the energy market.
Submit a request for custom analysis of energy market data based on specified parameters.
Obtain data on international energy trade flows and transactions.
Access annual statistics for production, consumption, and pricing of energy types.
Access predictive analytics on future pricing trends for energy commodities.
Retrieve trends and updates on the renewable energy sector.
Evaluate the environmental impact data related to energy sourcing and usage.
Receive alerts about sudden changes in metrics such as price or supply.
